exceptions.tactic: intros V f a b x e H1 H2 H3.
intros V' f a b x e H1 H2 H3.

exceptions.exn: No such bound variable b (possible names are: f0, a0, b0 and c).

original: intros V f a b x e H1 H2 H3. apply ex_RInt_swap. apply ex_RInt_Chasles_2 with (b:=x+e). apply Rle_minus in H2. apply Rle_trans with (Rabs (a - x)); auto. apply Rle_minus in H3. apply Rle_trans with (Rabs (b - x)); auto.
